subject: Relationships
title: The 5:1 Ratio of Happy Couples
description: A micro-lesson that makes The 5:1 Ratio of Happy Couples usable.

hook.text: Happy couples don't avoid negativity. They drown it ‚Äî with five positive interactions for every negative one.

buildup.text: Gottman's research found the magic ratio: 5 positive moments for every 1 negative predicts lasting love.

discovery.text: Positives include humor, affection, interest, and empathy. Negatives include criticism and dismissiveness.

twist.text: Below the ratio, couples feel the relationship is worse than it actually is. Perception becomes reality.

climax.text: You don't need to be perfect. You need to be positive five times more often than you are negative.

punchline.text: Happy couples aren't conflict-free. They're five-to-one positive.

quiz.question: What is Gottman's magic ratio for happy couples?
